title.zh: 线上：「她们的流血史」访谈计划启动
title.en: Online: 'Their Bleeding History' Interview Project Launched

description.zh: 血友姐妹会采访了数位受出血性疾病影响的女性，让她们的声音被听见。访谈计划包括5个主题：产床上险些丧命的血友妈妈、一年流掉身体90%血量的携带者姑娘、每次来月经都要打针的少女、不能上体育课的小女孩、一位母亲与两个VWD孩子。这些真实的故事揭示了女性血友病群体面临的困境和挑战。
description.en: The Hemophilia Sisters team interviewed several women affected by bleeding disorders, letting their voices be heard. The interview project includes 5 themes: hemophilia mothers who nearly died on the delivery bed, carrier girls who lost 90% of their body's blood in a year, teenagers who need injections every menstruation, little girls who can't attend PE classes, and a mother with two VWD children. These real stories reveal the difficulties and challenges faced by the female hemophilia community.
